item.description: Go 代码片段 go goroutines pool package main import ( "fmt" "github.com/sourcegraph/conc/pool" ) func main() { p := pool.New().WithMaxGoroutines(3) for i := 1; i <= 5; i++ { p.Go(func() { fmt.Println(i) }) } p.Wait() } 带ctx 的go goroutines pool package main import ( "context" "errors" "fmt" "github.com/sourcegraph/conc/pool" ) func main() { p := pool.New().
